title: What songs should every guitarist know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Keep On Rockin’ in the Free World by Neil YoungAnything Blues based like Red House by Jimi Hendrix and Purple HazeYour favorite Rolling Stones songParanoid by Black SabbathCommunication Breakdown by Led ZeppelinLots of Neil Young: Heart of Gold, The Needle and the Damage DoneSmoke on the Water by Deep PurpleI Can’t Explain by The WhoEight Days A Week by The BeatlesAll the songs that have G, C, D and Em. Then work more on making that F Major chord sound good and work in Am and Dm and you’ll be on your way.
Start with some “Smoke on the Water,” move on to some Ramons, work your way up to some Ted Nugent, and polish off your skills with some Randy Rhodes. I am assuming you mean the Rock genre.
